_meanings:
{@--3@} To rise, come up (as
the sun &c.).

{@--6@} To rise,
increase in strength or power, grow,
(as an enemy, disease &c.); (<ab>Atm.</ab>)
{#uttizWamAnastu paro nopekzyaH paTyamicCatA#}
<ls>Śi. 2. 10</ls> (= <ls>Pt. 1. 234.</ls>)

{@--1@} To cause to stand up,
raise, lift up: {#utTApyate grAvA#}  
<ls>H. 3. 42</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 59</ls>; raise or throw
up (as dust); <ls>R. 7. 39.</ls>
